sentences.en: An employer shoule be able to apprasise ability and character.
sentences.cn: 雇主应当有能力估计才能和性格.

sentences.en: He did his best to ingratiate himself with his employer.
He had been sent to Rome by his employer.
His employer greeted him with an effusion of relief.
sentences.cn: 他的雇主看到他大松一口气。

sentences.en: His employer had described him as lacking in initiative and drive.
sentences.cn: 雇主说他缺乏进取心和干劲.

sentences.en: His monthly salary is paid into the bank by his employer.
sentences.cn: 他的月薪由雇主替他存入银行.

sentences.en: His tightfisted employer was unwilling to give him a raise.
sentences.cn: 他那吝啬的雇主不肯给他加薪.

sentences.en: IBM has always been a paternalistic employer.
sentences.cn: 国际商用机器公司一直是个家长作风很强的雇主。

sentences.en: My employer deducted a pound from my wages this week.
sentences.cn: 我的雇主从我本周的工钱中扣除了一英镑.

sentences.en: My employer deducted ten pounds from my wages this week.
sentences.cn: 我的雇主从我本周的工钱中扣除了十英镑.

sentences.en: She cherished a deep resentment under the rose towards her employer.
sentences.cn: 她暗中对她的雇主怀恨在心.

sentences.en: She decided to sue her employer for wrongful dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她决定起诉雇主非法解雇她。

sentences.en: She is very virulent about her former employer.
sentences.cn: 她对她过去的老板恨之入骨.

sentences.en: The police force is committed to being an equal opportunities employer.
sentences.cn: 警方承诺向所有警员提供均等机会。

sentences.en: The shoe factory is the largest employer in this area.
sentences.cn: 这家制鞋厂是本地区最大的雇主。

sentences.en: They said she had a servile attitude to her employer.
sentences.cn: 他们说她对她的老板阿谀逢迎。
